content:
kpshek commented on Issue #9

We have two tutorials for developers:

First, @brettmarquard has been working on a 'Quick Start' guide that serves as a light tutorial. This will be merged in #113 as part of our CDS Hooks site.

Second, we have a great hands-on tutorial (thanks largely to @zplata!) for developers to write their own CDS Service, available at https://github.com/cerner/cds-services-tutorial. Developers at FHIR DevDays 2017 just went through this tutorial with positive feedback.

Closing.
